definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: I still get angry about an incident that happened last summer.
sentences.chinese: 對去年夏天發生的一件事至今我還餘怒未消。

sentences.english: But many shopkeepers remained angry over the handling of the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 但是仍有許多店主對於此次危機的解決方案存有餘怒。
